Articles.Content: Ok, an odd one here ive never encountered before. Ive launched a trip to Duna. I get into Kerbin orbit and set the manoeuvre node to Duna.....no problems. However, as I time warp the DeltaV on my lander reduces and ends up at zero left when I get to Duna....I had over 4000dv before I warped and the engine isnt being used?
Do you use any mods? At least one of the fuel mods (Hot Rockets?) adds the feature of slowly boiling off your oxidizer.
Are you using fuel cells for power, they consume liquid fuel and oxidizer.
do you use FuelCells for electric charge? they continue using fuel during timewarp

Yes, I use hot rockets but never experienced this before when I went to Duna.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-28T05:13:19Z" title="06/28/2015 05:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 28, 2015</time> by maceemiller**
